meanings.sent1: She carefully butylates the solution to enhance its properties.
meanings.sent2: The chemist butylates the substance to modify its characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The scientist accidentally butylates the wrong flask, creating a comical reaction.

meanings.sent5: The gardener butylates the soil, making the flowers bloom beautifully.

meanings.definition: To introduce a butyl group into a compound
meanings.sent1: He plans to butylate the molecule to study its effects.
meanings.sent2: The researcher butylates the chemical to observe its behavior.
meanings.sent3: The student mistakenly butylates the wrong test tube, causing a humorous mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The chef butylates the recipe with a new ingredient, adding a unique flavor.
meanings.sent5: The doctor butylates the medication, creating a more effective treatment.
